ratings.question_text: Your level of engagement with the course was:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the level of intellectual challenge of this course was:
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the workload of this course was:

narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments: It is difficult to answer this question when the Professor is capable of giving us a lifetime of education in a term. Professor Shore guided us into gaining not only skills and insights meant for a historian but also those of a scholar of the craft of writing. I learnt a lot this semester from her, perhaps the most I have from any mentor ever, in academia. I am grateful for the same and hope that I will be capable enough to pass this on to my students.

Developed a much deeper understanding of the components of totalitarian ideology and thinking, as well as of regional historic dynamics. Op-ed assignment format has been very interesting and useful as well.

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
comments: Strengths The Professor was interested in us and our growth as scholars for life and not only for this particular class. Leaving her class on Mondays felt like one was ready to take on the world and its chaos. The practice of starting with a 'happy anecdote' was great too. The fact that the class attracted some of the best scholars who were ready to share their opinions was an added benefit.
The readings are highly enjoyable, the amount of work is adequate. The balance is struck well.

narratives.question_text: Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
comments: Absolutely. I would recommend this course to any student of any major.
Excellent course with an expert in the field. Highly enjoyable and highly recommended.
